Package ru.dest.library.plugin

Interface IPlugin

public interface IPlugin
Representation of any plugin
Since:
1.0
Author:
DestKoder

      default boolean hasLang()
      method indicating whether the plugin uses a localization file
      Returns:
      true if using and false in other ways

    • load

      Loading method, called before enable()

      Exception - if exception occupied during loading a plugin

      Throws:
      Exception - if exception occupied during disabling

    • lang

      Get the localization of plugin
      Returns:
      ILocalization of this plugin if hasLang() or null in other ways

    • registry

      IPluginRegistry<? extends IPlugin> registry()
      Get the common IPluginRegistry of plugin. It is used for Registering commands and listeners
      Returns:
      IPluginRegistry object related to this plugin
